item.title: Help on the Kicking command
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

try this :

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5)); System.out.println(playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5)); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": Kicking Player: " + command.substring(5); }
